zoom-on.tooltip: Only applicable if there is not enough horizontal space to show all windows at once
zoom-on.description: Zoom in on the windows of the current workspace

display-origin-arrow.description: Display a small arrow, below the icon, to indicate the window you came from

vertical-alignment.description: Where to display the window switcher

thumbnails-behind-icons.description: Display a thumbnail behind switcher icons

compact-labels.description: Display the window title in a single-row label

display-thumbnail-headers.tooltip: Only applicable to some switcher styles
display-thumbnail-headers.description: Display thumbnail headers, showing the window icon and title

full-screen-thumbnails.tooltip: Only applicable to some switcher styles
full-screen-thumbnails.description: Use the full screen size to display thumbnails

background-image-enabled.description: Show the desktop background image behind thumbnails and previews

urgent-notifications.description: Use notifications to bring attention to attention-seeking windows

force-open-on-preferred-monitor.description: Move new windows to preferred monitor
